title: Ted Cruz = Real Tough Guy, Weed Smell = Progress 07.26.22
itunes:title: Ted Cruz = Real Tough Guy, Weed Smell = Progress 07.26.22
description:
In episode 1295, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian, writer, and director Sara June to discuss… Weed Legalization looks like some political funhouse mirror, Ted Cruz, PLEASE F--K RIGHT OFF, Companies Are Sending Baby Formula To Child-less Randos (Despite the Ongoing Shortage) and more!

  1. Weed Legalization Looks Like Some Political Funhouse Mirror
  2. How “weed smell” became a potent boogeyman of American decline
  3. Senate About to Hit This Weed Bill. But Some Democrats Don’t Want to Be Part of the Rotation
  4. Companies Are Sending Baby Formula To Child-less Randos (Despite the Ongoing Shortage)
  5. FDA Efforts to Result in Millions of Additional Bottles of Infant Formula to Further Increase U.S. Supply
  6. Biden invokes Defense Production Act to boost baby formula manufacturing to ease shortage
  7. TEXAS LAWMAKER VOTES AGAINST LIFTING TAX ON IMPORTED BABY FORMULA
  8. Unwanted Delivery: Surprise Baby Care Package Stuns Chicago Woman and Many Others

  9. Are Companies Sending Out Baby Formula Samples During A Shortage?

LISTEN: New Wage Slavery by End It

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
